oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic seeds and varieties. The market situation in Europe
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Thommen, Andreas
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Breeding, genetics and propagation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Although very different concepts, the terms "organic seed" and "organic varieties" can be confusing. Here they are explained and the market situation in Europe for both categories discussed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Thommen, Andreas (2003) Organic seeds and varieties. The market situation in Europe. The Organic Standard (30), pp. 7-9.
